articles.title: Dow Futures Crash 1,000 Points as Fed’s Bullard Cites -50% U.S. GDP
articles.description: Dow futures halted trading overnight as the Fed's Bullard outlined his belief that coronavirus could force 30% unemployment and -50% GDP. The post Dow Futures Crash 1,000 Points as Fed’s Bullard Cites -50% U.S. GDP appeared first on CCN.com
articles.content:
• Stock market futures crashed limit down across the board on Sunday as the coronavirus crisis continued.
  • Fueling the capitulation, Fed President James Bullard cited the possibility of a -50% GDP reading in Q2 alongside 30% unemployment.
